reference.title: Requisition States
reference.shortdesc: A list of possible requsition states.

property.propdesc: Your order has passed through all budget checks and is currently in the process of becoming a PO.
An order of over $100 that is waiting for your approver to authorize before going on to the next stage of budget checks.
An order of under $100 that has become a requisition and is moving onto the next stage of budget checks.
Your order has passed all budget checks, become a requistion, and is now an active PO.
Requistion could not be created due to an issue with your EFS chart string.
